p: According to Gupta and Vasudeva [ 55], mature fruits with seeds contained ( Z)-β-ocimene (6.4–36.8%), ( Z)-tagetone (10.5–17.1%), ( Z)-tagetenone (0.5–3.0%), and ( E)-tagetenone (0.2–7.5%), in addition to dihydrotagetone (35.7%), ( E)-β-ocimene (15.5%), limonene (5.4%), β-phellandrene (4.7%), and sabinene (0.2%). In addition, T. minuta could present trace amounts of α-terthienyl.
